snippet.title: 「ROMANCING MONARCHY」Trailer
snippet.description: The official trailer for Romancing Monarchy, an old-school fantasy JRPG heavily inspired by classic 8-bit RPGs. As the Prince of Achaea, it is your duty to obtain the Mandate of Heaven to continue your family's rule over Achaea. After assembling a party of four at Ruth's Tavern, you set off to explore the world in search of the Mandate, while meeting new faces on the way.
